scripts.serve: NODE_ENV=development ENVIRONMENT_LOCAL=true firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore,pubsub | tee functions-emulator.log
scripts.kill: sudo lsof -i :8085,8080 | sed -n '2p' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.start: firebase use development && npm run runtime && npm run shell
scripts.start:production: development=true && firebase use production && npm run runtime:production && npm run shell
scripts.deploy:development: firebase use development && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:production: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions; firebase use development
